segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is methodically drying a dish by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the faucet running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling out, making a real flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped into it without a care, still focused ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a bit down to see her so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is risking it all for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is high, and the stool wobbles dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's cooperation adds to the cuteness, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden invites a sense of calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how kids' mischief can lead to trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes wait patiently nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene captures the unpredictability of home life.
segments.speaker: PAR
